task_pushups: Do {number} push-ups. Keep your body straight, lower yourself until your chest almost touches the ground, then push back up. Keep your elbows close to your body.
task_squats: Do {number} squats. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your hips back and down as if sitting in a chair, then stand back up. Keep your knees behind your toes.
task_diamond_pushups: Do {number} diamond push-ups. Place your hands close together under your chest, forming a diamond shape with your fingers. Lower yourself until your chest almost touches your hands, then push back up.
task_lunges: Do {number} lunges (each leg). Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at about a 90-degree angle. Push back up to the starting position and switch legs.
task_plank: Hold a plank for {number} seconds. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels, with your elbows directly under your shoulders. Engage your core and avoid letting your hips sag.
task_mountain_climbers: Do {number} mountain climbers. Start in a plank position, then quickly alternate bringing your knees to your chest, as if running in place.
task_high_knees: Run in place, lifting knees high for {number} seconds. Bring your knees up to waist level, pumping your arms as you run.
task_jump_squats: Do {number} jump squats. Perform a squat, then explode upwards into a jump. Land softly and immediately go into the next squat.
task_crunches: Do {number} crunches. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lift your shoulders off the ground, squeezing your abs, then lower back down.
task_burpees: Do {number} burpees. From a standing position, drop into a squat, kick your feet back into a plank, do a push-up, return to squat, and jump up with arms overhead.
